2. Growth Hormone Secreting Pituitary Adenoma

5. Hyperparathyroidism
6. Primary Hyperpituitary Macroadenoma

Please note that these top 10 diagnoses are based on the provided patient phenotype and are meant to be a diverse and comprehensive differential diagnosis. Additional clinical information or testing may be required to narrow down the final diagnosis.
